text: Octopussy is a 1983 British spy action movie directed by John Glen and is the 13th movie in the James Bond franchise. It stars Roger Moore, Maud Adams, Louis Jourdan, Kristina Wayborn, Kabir Bedi, Steven Berkoff, Desmond Llewelyn, Geoffrey Keen, Robert Brown, Lois Maxwell and was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980s spy movies Category:1983 action movies Category:James Bond movies Category:Roger Moore Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies set in India Category:Cold War movies Category:Movies directed by John Glen Category:Movies composed by John Barry
title: Octopussy
